DialogueText.Text: God, that was so boring. I don't know how the rest of y'all eat up that slop. Paradise this, Paradise that... If I hear that word one more time, I might just lose it!
You're on thin ice, pal... But apology accepted, I suppose. Here I thought these things couldn't get any worse...

I'm glad I'm not the only one who's not buying all this slop... If I could skip these, trust me I would. But the Orator says these'll be 'enlightening', and that they're required for my training... What a joke.

The Orator has been kind enough to train me in the ways of magic; he believes I have much potential. His knowledge is most certainly vast, and he has opened my eyes to the vast possibilities of my magic. Though... I can't shake the feeling he's... disappointed in me.

Yeah, you might be on to something. He's still leagues ahead of me so... Guess it is only natural to feel like I'm not up to his standards. Well, what do I care anyway? I'm just here to get what I want from him. Once he's taught me everything, I don't plan on spending another second around here!
Ugh, please do not compare me to... her. Though... You might be onto something... Is that the only reason the Orator's training me? To have a Brimstone Witch of his own?! Thats- ...
I can't believe it! That's seriously all he wanted out of me?! I can't believe I was so stupid! Screw this!! I'm DONE!!! Done with all of this dumb garbage!
Maybe I'm thinking too much about this. Clearly I need to get the hell out of here; this place seems to only be good at pissing me off and stressing me out...

Hmm... Never really thought about it like that. My magic and skills have certainly grown, but... I don't really know if there's much more he's got for me. If he were just leading me along so I keep showing up to these things... Well, I'd be pissed that's for sure!

Yeah... He does seem like the type. Well screw him! I'm plenty powerful with my magic now; I don't need his help anymore! And if it means getting out of showing up to these, well that's just the cherry on top!
I mean, I'm getting taught magic from a pretty dang skilled guy so... can't really complain now can I. If he wants me to take part in his little pet project here then fine. I'll survive... Probably.

Well, thanks for the help I guess. Not sure I'd have been able to piece that all together on my own... Makes me feel... kinda stupid, but whatever. I'm happy I can kiss these stupid things goodbye at least!

Responses.Title: I need to tell you something...

DialogueText.Text: See you around I guess... Though maybe not. Ditching these is sounding real good right about now.
